channel.title: Making a wildy-zone
channel.description: I am using a Deltascape source, and I've got a really good home area and I'd like to ad a bit of wilderness underneath it. How do I make it so that a medium sized rectangle is a PvP zone, also if you could I'd like to make it so any level can attack any level. :D

item.title: Making a wildy-zone
item.dc:creator: @Demise Demise
item.description:
@Demise wrote:

I am using a Deltascape source, and I’ve got a really good home area and I’d like to ad a bit of wilderness underneath it.
How do I make it so that a medium sized rectangle is a PvP zone, also if you could I’d like to make it so any level can attack any level.

Read full topic
